blockedStatements.sql: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN x TEXT
GRANT ALL ON users TO public
REVOKE ALL ON users FROM admin

multiStatements: SELECT * FROM organizations; DROP TABLE users
validQueries: SELECT name, type FROM organizations WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM organizations GROUP BY type
SELECT o.name, COUNT(m.id) FROM organizations o LEFT JOIN members m ON m.organization_id = o.id GROUP BY o.name
SELECT * FROM organizations ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100
WITH active_orgs AS (SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE status = 'active') SELECT * FROM active_orgs

tableExtraction.sql: SELECT o.name, u.email FROM organizations o INNER JOIN users u ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.user_id = u.id
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE id IN (SELECT org_id FROM memberships WHERE active = true)

parameterExtraction.sql: SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE id = {{organization_id}} AND type = {{type}}
